amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to provide for the welfare of Special Category Residents at Naval Station Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1885 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1885 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Martinez. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12591) To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to provide for the welfare of Special Category Residents at Naval Station Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1885 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1885 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Martinez.
